definitions.definition: Harsh and sharp , or bitter and not pleasant to the taste ; acrid , pungent .
Angry , acid , and sharp in delivering argumentative replies : bitter , mean-spirited , sharp in language or tone .

main_definition: ( archaic ) Harsh and sharp , or bitter and not pleasant to the taste ; acrid , pungent .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Angry , acid , and sharp in delivering argumentative replies : bitter , mean-spirited , sharp in language or tone . [from early 17th c.]
